I am transmitting herewith a draft of the
Appendix to the Italia Prize Statutes regarding the insti¬
tution of a prize to be awarded to a television documentary
program. The draft has been drawn up from the Secretariat
according to the instructions it received during the course of
the last General Assembly in Perugia. This draft is to be
discussed by the coming General Assembly due to meet in
Rimini on Tuesday, September 11th. If you have any comments,
suggestions or ideas which might be to NAEB's interest in con¬
nection with the Appendix, I wish you would forward these to me
at your early convenience.
